description: Learning how to handle money is a big step towards achieving independence.
It helps to know who you are before you can decide what you want to do!
There are lots of choices when it comes to education. Read people's experiences.
Whether we're talking family or romance, relationships are a big part of our lives.
It's hard to get on when you're not feeling it physically. Mental health is also important.
Making a home is a big part of your pathway and life in general. How have other people made it work?
Learning to apply your skills and being successful in the job market is not a small challenge. Perhaps others have some wisdom to share.
